document.full_text: south korea repatriated on sunday 27 north koreans whose boat drifted into the south's waters last month, the south's red cross said, ending a row which threatened to further damage relations between the two koreas.
document.title: south korea sends 27 north koreans home
lines_and_colors: south korea repatriated on sunday 27 north koreans whose boat drifted into the south's waters last month, the south's red cross said, ending a row which threatened to further damage relations between the two koreas.
